column1: ===== TOTAL POINTS POSSIBLE: 100 =====
Woohoo! You made it through the advanced quiz, Aryan!
That takes serious dedication. Scroll down when ready for answers!
===== ANSWER KEY =====
Q#
column3: Explanation
FIND locates the space, LEFT extracts characters before it
TEXT converts numbers to formatted text (44927 = Jan 1, 2023)
All three methods work for combining text!
Extract everything after the @ symbol
DATEDIF with 'Y' returns complete years between dates
Sum column B where column A equals 'North'
SUMIFS allows multiple criteria, SUMIF allows only one
Count cells greater than 500 (criteria in quotes!)
Row labels appear down the left side of the PivotTable
Use AVERAGEIF to average only 2023 dates
Pie charts show parts of a whole (proportions)
Line charts are best for showing trends over time
Trendlines help visualize patterns and make predictions

column2: Click on the title and type new text, OR right-click > Edit Text
column3: You can directly edit chart elements by clicking them
Secondary axis allows two different scales on one chart
